name: 恩斯特·普林斯海姆
bio_short: 德国实验物理学家。他与奥托·卢默（Otto Lummer）合作，对“黑体辐射”进行了精确测量，为普朗克的量子假说提供了关键的实验数据。
bio_short_en: A German experimental physicist. In collaboration with Otto Lummer, his precise measurements of 'black-body radiation' provided the critical experimental data for Max Planck's quantum hypothesis.
